name: Amopalypse (DEMO)
description:
"Together, we can change this world. Make it perfect, clean. I’m a smart man, I can give you orders from afar and you… Well you possess a truly incredible skill…. 

You’re a janitor."

Play as Jan, a janitor trying to clean a post-apocalyptic world. Explore a long-abandoned school to find your trusty mop and discover what lies in the heart of its corridors...

This project is a prototype of a full game we're hoping to make - a janitor-themed metroidvania.

[Royalty free music by https://bensound.com]
